original_text: Esau went to a land that was a long way from his brother Jacob. He took with him his wives, his sons and daughters and everyone in his house. He took his animals and all the things that he had got while he lived in Canaan.
korean_text: 에서가 자기 아내들과 자기 자녀들과 자기 집의 모든 사람과 자기의 가축과 자기의 모든 짐승과 자기가 가나안 땅에서 모은 모든 재물을 이끌고 그의 동생 야곱을 떠나 다른 곳으로 갔으니

sentences.original_text: that was a long way from his brother Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 그의 형제 야곱으로부터 아 먼 곳이었습니다

sentences.original_text: He took with him his wives

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 집에 있는 모든 사람을

sentences.original_text: that he had got while he lived in Canaan
